Who Am I?

ABOUT ME


I am a versatile developer with a strong foundation in front-end development, Angular, Android, and Java. I hold a Master's degree in Computer Applications (MCA) and a Bachelor's degree in Computer Applications (BCA). My professional experience includes a six-month internship at Ankhub Technology Services as an Angular Developer, where I developed robust front-end solutions.



What is my experience?

Work Experience

  • Front End Developer Intern

    May 2024 - Current

    Shri Ramdeobaba College of Engineering and Management, Nagpur

    • Developed the official Shri Ramdeobaba University website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap, ensuring a visually appealing and functional user interface.
    • Implemented responsive web design techniques to ensure the website is accessible and user-friendly across various devices and screen sizes.
    • Managed and manipulated data using SQL query language, ensuring seamless integration and efficient data handling within the website.
    • Worked collaboratively with university stakeholders to continuously update and maintain the website, ensuring it meets the evolving needs and standards.

  • Frontend Developer (Angular Developer) Intern

    Ankhub Technology Services, Nagpur

    Mar 2022 - Aug 2022
    • Prioritized and problem-solved several tasks concurrently with minimum supervision.
    • Followed best practices for software development.
    • Technical stack used: Angular ,HTML ,CSS,Bootstrap for UI ,Javascript, TypeScript for backend.
    • Tools used: Visual Studio Code for code editing, Trello for project management.

Front End Developer

I am a dynamic and detail-oriented Frontend Developer with extensive experience in creating interactive, user-friendly, and feature-rich websites. My expertise spans various projects, including the official website of Shri Ramdeobaba University, where I utilized HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and SQL to develop a responsive and visually appealing web interface.
Additionally, I designed and implemented the PGAV Rental System's user-friendly interface using Angular, HTML, CSS, TypeScript,JavaScript and Bootstrap, focusing on form validations and responsive design.
My work on the Cafe Mocha Mania project involved developing an engaging website with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, ensuring consistent design, dynamic content loading, and performance optimization. With a solid foundation in both theoretical and practical aspects of web development, I am committed to continuously honing my skills and staying updated with the latest industry trends. My diverse project experience equips me to tackle complex challenges and deliver exceptional results.

Tech Stack


Angular Developer

I am a dynamic and detail-oriented Angular Developer with extensive experience in creating interactive, user-friendly, and feature-rich websites. My expertise spans various projects, including the PGAV Rental System, where I designed and implemented a user-friendly interface using Angular, HTML, CSS, TypeScript, Bootstrap, routing, and Template Driven Forms. This project focused on form validations and responsive design.
Additionally, I developed the Cafe Mocha Mania project, creating an engaging website with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Angular Components. I ensured consistent design, dynamic content loading, and performance optimization throughout the application. With a solid foundation in both theoretical and practical aspects of web development, I am committed to continuously honing my skills and staying updated with the latest industry trends. My diverse project experience equips me to tackle complex challenges and deliver exceptional results.

Tech Stack


Android Application Developer

As an Android Developer, I specialize in developing robust and user-friendly applications. I have significant experience with projects such as the Health Care Android Application and the Expense and Expenditure Application: I developed the Health Care Android Application using Java and Android Studio, incorporating Firebase for seamless user authentication and data management. The app enables users to book doctor appointments, order lab tests, and manage their health profiles through intuitive interfaces and engaging Lottie Animations. Additionally, I created the Expense and Expenditure Application, leveraging Kotlin and Android Studio. This app provides users with a straightforward interface to track expenses efficiently. I integrated Firebase for secure authentication and data storage, enhancing the user experience with fluid Lottie Animations. My work reflects a deep understanding of Android development principles, ensuring high performance, usability, and security in every application I build.

Tech Stack


Java Developer

As a Java Developer, I specialize in developing robust and scalable applications. One of my notable projects is the Employee Management Project:
I developed the Employee Management Project as a full-stack application using Spring Boot for the backend API and Java for application logic. The frontend was implemented with Angular, HTML, CSS, TypeScript, and Bootstrap, providing a responsive and user-friendly interface. I utilized Postman for API testing and validation, ensuring smooth integration and functionality across the application.
This project showcased my proficiency in Java programming, Spring Boot framework, and frontend technologies, highlighting my ability to deliver efficient and comprehensive solutions for complex business requirements.
